meanings.definition: Born or coming into existence after someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The laterborn kittens were smaller than their older siblings.
meanings.sent2: The younger plants were considered laterborn compared to the mature trees.
meanings.sent3: The laterborn flowers bloomed just in time for the spring festival.
meanings.sent4: Her laterborn ideas brought a fresh perspective to the project.
meanings.sent5: The laterborn stars sparkled brightly in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A person who is born after another sibling.
meanings.sent1: As the laterborn, she often looked up to her older sister for guidance.
meanings.sent2: The laterborn in the family was always eager to learn from their older siblings.
meanings.sent3: The laterborn sibling always got the hand-me-down clothes, but they made them their own style.
meanings.sent4: Being the laterborn felt like following in footsteps already imprinted in the sand.
meanings.sent5: The laterborn child brought joy and laughter to the family with their playful antics.
